data.fullContent: Piaget was a Swiss biologist who is most known as a cognitive developmental psychologist. Although Piaget is known as a cognitive-developmental psychologist and not as an educational psychologist, his impact on education has been profound. In fact, the research on cognitive development serves as the backbone for curriculum studies and associated instructional practices. Following the completion of his studies at the Sorbonne, he was appointed research director at the Rousseau Institute in Geneva.
data.answer: 皮亚杰是一位瑞士生物学家，以认知发展心理学家而闻名。虽然皮亚杰是一位认知发展心理学家而不是教育心理学家，但他对教育的影响是深远的。事实上，认知发展的研究是课程研究和相关教学实践的支柱。在完成索邦大学的学业后，他被任命为日内瓦卢梭研究所的研究主任。
